discussion_comments.comment_body:
尴尬，`mask` 在走废弃流程。但是这个 previewMask 似乎有会多一次废弃，未来肯定还是 `mask` 属性。要不然做点 tricky 的事情：
1. mask 如果是 object，则是新版本的配置
2. mask 如果是 ReactNode，则是旧版本的用法，需要 warning

discussion_comments.comment_body:
https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/master/components/tree/Tree.tsx#L194
https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/master/components/tree/utils/dropIndicator.tsx

It seems that this configuration is defined internally by antd, but rc-tree allows users to customize it. So it shouldn't be shown in the document?


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7cf3d78d-412a-4b5f-838c-f9ed26b4928b)

discussion_comments.comment_body:
Great catch!
It does appear as an auto complete option when using the Tree. And looks like valid code. Which is a bit misleading when using the Tree.

![Screenshot 2025-07-03 135121](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/14aee8fb-951a-4d90-9207-7c8bfca4c4d9)

It should be included in this list of Omitted props so it doesn't appear to the person implementing the Tree.

```
export interface TreeProps<T extends BasicDataNode = DataNode>
  extends Omit<
    RcTreeProps<T>,
    'prefixCls' | 'showLine' | 'direction' | 'draggable' | 'icon' | 'switcherIcon'
  > {
```

You are right. 

Can you help us implement this type of omit?

If possible, you can remove the document changes in this pr and replace it with type omit, which should be accepted.   :)

commented_code: 如果你在 Next.js 当中使用了 Pages Router, 并使用 antd 作为页面组件库，为了让 antd 组件库在你的 Next.js 应用中能够更好的工作，提供更好的用户体验，你可以尝试使用下面的方式将 antd 首屏样式按需抽离并植入到 HTML 中，以避免页面闪动的情况。 -1. 安装 `@ant-design/cssinjs` - -> 开发者注意事项： -> -> 请注意，安装 `@ant-design/cssinjs` 时必须确保版本号跟 `antd` 本地的 `node_modules` 中的 `@ant-design/cssinjs` 版本保持一致，否则会出现多个 React 实例，导致无法正确的读取 ctx。（Tips: 你可以通过 `npm ls @ant-design/cssinjs` 命令查看本地版本） -> -> - - - -2. 改写 `pages/_document.tsx` +1. 改写 `pages/_document.tsx` ```tsx import React from 'react'; -import { createCache, extractStyle, StyleProvider } from '@ant-design/cssinjs'; +import { createCache, extractStyle, StyleProvider } from 'antd';
